page.title: 01Watford: Location.
page.content: Watford is the main town in South West Hertfordshire. It is a mixture of old and new building developments with a mixture of indusrties. It is situated in "Green Belt" countryside and yet it is only 17 miles from the centre of London. The M1 Motorway passes through the outskirts of Watford, making good road links with London and the North. When the M25 Motorway is completed it will also be quite close to Watford.It is on a main line railway and has a London Underground station. There is a market 3 days a week and the town centre has a large selection of shops and several department stores. The Grand Union Canal passes right through Watford.
